title: A Request to joined Alumni Members in Portal
text: Dear Alumni Members, It is observed that number of alumni registered in this alumni portal is constant now. we are around 3000 members of Alumni Association but only 510 members are registered in this portal. I am requested to all registered members in this portal to encourage your batchmate and others to join who has not joined yet. We (Alumni of GBPIET) can also contribute for the development of the College, and We have to come in comman platform for contribution. So, I am requesting again to encourage those alumni who has not joined yet. Thanks

title: JOB OPENINGS
text: Dear Alumnis, Please post job opening in this thread mentioning briefly: 1. Name of company 2. Job profile 3. Eligibility Criteria/Qualification: 4. Experience 5. Contact details including email. In case requirement is fulfilled, post may also be deleted.

title: Notice
text: Dear Alumni Members, It is observed that number of alumni registered in this alumni portal is constant now. we are around 3000 members of Alumni Association but only 510 members are registered in this portal. I am requested to all registered members in this portal to encourage your batchmate and others to join who has not joined yet. We (Alumni of GBPIET) can also contribute for the development of the College, and We have to come in comman platform for contribution. So, I am requesting again to encourage those alumni who has not joined yet. Thanks
